de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base

Interface SessionBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSession

    public interface SessionBase
    Generic TNC(C/S) session base. It contains the basic functionality to manage a session.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes a session.
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed getAttributes()
      Returns the session attributes.
      void handle(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.ComprehensibleException e)
      If a exceptions with further objects to assess the reason occurred, it can be handled by the session.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns if the session is closed.
      void registerConnection(TransportConnection connection)
      Registers a transport connection for message transmission with the session.
      void registerStatemachine(StateMachine machine)
      Registers a state machine to be used by the session for the integrity handshake and connection management.
      void start(boolean selfInitiated)
      Starts the session and initializes its management functions.

    • Method Detail

      • registerStatemachine

        void registerStatemachine(StateMachine machine)
        Registers a state machine to be used by the session for the integrity handshake and connection management. This method is used to initialize the session properly and can only be called once.
        Parameters:
        machine - the state machine

      • registerConnection

        void registerConnection(TransportConnection connection)
        Registers a transport connection for message transmission with the session. This method is used to initialize the session properly and can only be called once.
        Parameters:
        connection - the related transport connection

      • start

        void start(boolean selfInitiated)
        Starts the session and initializes its management functions.
        Parameters:
        selfInitiated - true if the underlying connection was initiated by this side and not by a remote peer

      • handle

        void handle(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.ComprehensibleException e)
        If a exceptions with further objects to assess the reason occurred, it can be handled by the session.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception

      • close

        void close()
        Closes a session.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns if the session is closed.
        Returns:
        true if session is closed

      • getAttributes

        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed getAttributes()
        Returns the session attributes.
        Returns:
        the session attributes
